column5: My girlfriend's parents live near Swan River, and I'm wondering if there are any decent walleye lakes up there, say, within an hour drive. Might as well kill two birds with one stone while visiting. I'd ask them, but they don't fish.Thanks in advance.

I have family that live in the Duck Mountain Park. While they fish for trout I do know that there are a few lakes there that have walleyes, such as Wellman which is just south of Swan River. I've never fished the area for walleye however my dad caught four master angler rainbows and one master angler arctic char in the park last june.
Thanks for the info, sounds interesting. It doesn't have to be just walleyes, anything to cast a line at.
East Blue lake,has all your looking for even the new Manitoba Rainbow record 32.5 incher.Splake,Rainbows,Lakers.Good luck.FISH ON.
